meanings.definition: To change the structure or form of (something)
meanings.sent1: We are remodeling our kitchen to make it more spacious.
meanings.sent2: The company is remodeling the office to create a better work environment.
meanings.sent3: After remodeling the living room, it felt like a whole new space.
meanings.sent4: She was remodeling her wardrobe, trying on different styles like a chameleon changing colors.
meanings.sent5: The remodeling of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.

meanings.definition: The act of making changes to improve the appearance or functionality of a building
meanings.sent1: The remodeling of the old house brought new life to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: We hired a team for the remodeling of the school gymnasium.
meanings.sent3: The remodeling of the library turned it into a cozy reading nook.
meanings.sent4: The remodeling of the city skyline with new skyscrapers was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The remodeling of the historic building preserved its charm for future generations.
